name: Air Strike - 3D Combat
description:
The Ultimate Combat Experience:
You are under attack by the enemy. Your job in Air Strike is to Battle against the multiple military jets in this adventurous shooting game! This war has gone completely madness and everyone is firing... You're a Pilot and it's War Time! Discover this fast paced shoot em up action game with hours, even days of fun.
FEATURES: 
-Great realistic graphics and gameplay
-Astonishing themes/background music
-Control your plane with mouse
